name: CmapTools Concept Map File
summary: Learn about .CMAP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: IHMC stands for the Institute for Human and Machine Cognition, a research institute of the Florida University System.

description: Diagram file created by IHMC CmapTools, a program used for drawing concept maps; stores a visual diagram that depicts an idea using blocks, arrows and text; used for capturing thoughts and ideas during the brainstorming process; also used for sharing ideas with others.
